title: A11y-sitechecker
creator: Martin Forstner
description: A11y-sitecheker is a tool to check a whole site against accessibility criteria. It uses axe-core to check whole sites for accessibility issues. It is crawling the first given Domain and tries to find all links recursivly. In addition it is possible to click elements which have a tabindex >= 0
guideline: WCAG 2.1 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.1
WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
automated: Groups of web pages or web sites
